text: Walter Pilling (18 April 1935 - June 1999) was a British wrestler. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics and the 1964 Summer Olympics. He also represented England and won a silver medal in 57 kg bantamweight division, at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Perth, Western Australia. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:1999 deaths Category:British male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of Great Britain Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Wrestlers at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bradford Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in wrestling Category:Wrestlers at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for England
title: Walter Pilling
